mapper.select: /* channel.selectRcsRegTmpltList */ SELECT MESSAGEBASE_ID , MESSAGEBASEFORM_ID , BRAND_ID , CORP_ID , TMPLT_NAME , PRODUCT_CODE , MESSAGEBASE_INFO , APPROVAL_STATUS , REG_ID , UPD_ID , USE_YN , REG_DT , UPD_DT , APPROVAL_DT FROM cm.CM_RCS_MSGBASE WHERE BRAND_ID = #{brandId}

/* channel.selectRcsCallbackList */ SELECT CHATBOT_ID , BRAND_ID , CORP_ID , SVC_TYPE , CHATBOT_INFO , APPROVAL_STATUS , USE_YN , REG_DT , UPD_DT , APPROVAL_DT FROM CM_RCS_CHATBOT WHERE BRAND_ID = #{brandId}

/* channel.selectPushManageList */ SELECT A.APP_ID , A.APP_NM , A.CORP_ID , A.PROJECT_ID , A.SERVICE_STATUS , CASE WHEN A.FCM_SERVER_KEY != '' THEN 'Y' ELSE 'N' END AS FCM_YN , A.FCM_PACKAGE_NAME , A.FCM_SERVER_KEY , A.SENDER_ID , CASE WHEN A.APNS_FILE_NAME != '' THEN 'Y' ELSE 'N' END AS APNS_YN , A.APNS_CETIFICATION , A.APNS_FILE_NAME , A.IOS_APP_ID , A.TEAM_KEY , A.KEY_ID , A.TYPE , A.REG_ID , date_format(A.REG_DT, '%Y-%m-%d') AS REG_DT , A.MOD_ID , A.MOD_DT FROM cm_push.T_PUSH_CONFIG A WHERE 1 = 1 AND A.PROJECT_ID = #{projectId} AND A.CORP_ID = #{corpId}
